desc: Take Two Barleymilk is a totally delicious, good-source-of-protein, non-dairy milk made from upcycled barley. Take Two helps create second chances for food, people, and the planet by upcycling nutrient-rich grain and transforming it into delicious plant-based barleymilk #DrinkLattesShrinkLandfills

layout.text:
Take Two Barleymilk is a totally delicious, good-source-of-protein, non-dairy milk made from upcycled barley. Take Two helps create second chances for food, people, and the planet by upcycling nutrient-rich grain and transforming it into delicious plant-based barleymilk.

You can make an impact today!
